name: The Warrior King of Wakanda Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: It is widely known that T'Challa is the Black Panther, but his father's name is less-known. What is it?
questions.explanation:
T'Chaka.

	T'Chaka was the Black Panther before T'Challa, the superheroic image being an image of office. As such, T'Challa uses the costume while attending diplomatic functions and other important meetings.

questions.text: In order to prove himself a worthy leader, T'Challa defeated the Fantastic Four.
questions.explanation:
True.

	It was only after all four heroes were defeated that T'Challa revealed his intentions and made up for his forward attacks.

questions.text: Who promoted T'Challa's inclusion in the Avengers?
questions.explanation:
Captain America.

	The Black Panther was made an Avenger with the backing of Captain America. Nearly immediately thereafter, T'Challa defeated the Grim Reaper, who nearly destroyed the team.

questions.text: T'Challa married the singer Monica Lynne.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In a Wakandan ceremony, T'Challa married Ororo Munroe, the X-Man known as Storm. The two had a brief romance in their teenage years and married shortly before the Civil War.

questions.text: T'Challa once suffered from a brain tumor.
questions.explanation:
False.

	T'Challa suffered from a brain aneurysm, not a tumor. A future version of T'Challa also had a brain aneurysm, tipping the present-day Black Panther off to the malady.

questions.text: While he was ill, T'Challa trained Danny Rand.
questions.explanation:
False.

	A narcotics officer on the NYPD named Kasper Cole benefited from T'Challa's teachings, not Danny Rand. Rand would have no need of them, as he is the superhero known as Iron Fist.

questions.text: T'Challa fought vampires in a ravaged New Orleans. Who did not help him?
questions.explanation:
War Machine.

	Jim Rhodes most often wears the War Machine armor, developed by Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man. Wearing this armor, Rhodes was a member of the team known as Force Works.

questions.text: THe Black Panther recently joined the Fantastic Four. Whose spot did he take?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Fantastic

	Reed and Sue Richards decided to take a break from superheroics, and T'Challa and Storm were brought in to serve as interim members. The new Fantastic Four met the Watcher in outer space.

questions.text: The Black Panther has superhuman senses and peak human strength and speed. How did he get these powers?
questions.correct: He eats a special kind of herb
questions.explanation:
He eats a special kind of herb.

	The heart-shaped herb is found only in Wakanda, and is toxic to anyone outside of the royal family. They are naturally immune to its harmful effects.

questions.text: During his tenure as a teacher in New York City's school systems, what alias did T'Challa use?
questions.explanation:
Luke Charles.

	It was during this time that he met and wooed American singer Monica Lynne and became involved in the American Black Panther movement. It should be noted that T'Challa's creation predates that of the Black Panther political party.
